*****
I just uploaded my final yah !

Features :
2 secrets.
2 bombsites
34x34 SPAWNPOINTS
Good detail
And much more...
***************
The main point :

The CTs have to protect the house.
While the T´s have to bomb the house.
Ct´s spawn inside the house, while T´s spawn outside and under the roof.
Theres 2 secrets if u watch the video u will see 1 of them.
The main point is to bomb the house, not killing the ct´s.
There are 2 ways into the house, more balanced.
